ygData.subject: Re: Help!! I need advice! Spoiler advice
ygData.msgSnippet: ... About the best earring I can see, according to the chart at http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_table.asp would be sapphire/electrum for +4
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Sep 08/99, Mike Roach <mroach@...> wrote:
>
> I personally wear 2 +5CHA 2AC Opalline earrings because I did not make my
> natural CHA so high to start with, but for you, you could look for STR
> increasing earrings instead to help out as well.

About the best earring I can see, according to the chart at
http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_table.asp
would be sapphire/electrum for +4 str/+2 int. There's also amber/gold at
+3 str, which might be a bit cheaper.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
